org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util
Class CloseHookConnectionWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util.CloseHookConnectionWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public class CloseHookConnectionWrapper
extends Object
implements Connection

This is a connection wrapper that allows a close hook to be added to the connection

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

Constructor Detail

CloseHookConnectionWrapper

public CloseHookConnectionWrapper(Connection connection,
                                  Runnable closeHook)
Create a connection wrapper which allows a close hook to be added

Parameters:
connection - the connection to wrap
closeHook - execute this hook when the connection closes
